nml_option.name: config_mixed_layer_eddies_vert_levels
nml_option.description: Number of vertical levels in mixed layer eddies test case. Typical value is 20.
nml_option.possible_values: Any positive integer number greater than 0.

nml_option.name: config_mixed_layer_eddies_background_stratification
nml_option.description: stratification of the interior, given in multiples of the coriolis parameter

nml_option.name: config_mixed_layer_eddies_ML_stratification
nml_option.description: stratification of the mixed layer, given in multiples of the coriolis parameter.
nml_option.possible_values: Any real number greater than equal to zero

nml_option.name: config_mixed_layer_eddies_horizontal_buoyancy_grad
nml_option.description: horizontal buouyancy gradient, multiple of coriolis parameter, b_grad = -(param*f)^2
nml_option.possible_values: Any real number greater than zero

nml_option.name: config_mixed_layer_eddies_frontal_width
nml_option.description: width of buoyancy front, given as multiple of grid spacing, dcEdge
nml_option.possible_values: Any real number greater than 0, greater than 10 recommended

nml_option.name: config_mixed_layer_eddies_mixed_layer_depth
nml_option.possible_values: Any positive real number less than bottom depth

nml_option.name: config_mixed_layer_eddies_use_shortwave
nml_option.description: use idealized diurnal cycle, requires surface cooling to be non zero.

nml_option.name: config_mixed_layer_eddies_density_0
nml_option.description: reference density, test case assumes linear EOS.

nml_option.name: config_mixed_layer_eddies_alpha
nml_option.description: thermal expansion coefficient, for linear EOS

nml_option.name: config_mixed_layer_eddies_beta
nml_option.description: haline contraction coefficient, for linear EOS
